text: I'll Never Forget You is a 1951 British romantic fantasy movie. It was also titled The House in the Square and Man of Two Worlds. It was directed by Roy Ward Baker. The movie is based on the play Berkeley Square by John L. Balderston. It was adapted previously in the 1933 movie under the title of Berkeley Square. It stars Tyrone Power, Ann Blyth, Kathleen Byron, and Michael Rennie. ==Other websites== * Category:1951 romance movies Category:1950s fantasy movies Category:1950s historical movies Category:British romance movies Category:British fantasy movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Roy Ward Baker
title: I'll Never Forget You (movie)
